resources.string: An initiative from the OTML 90 Day Challenge!

"Welcome to Safety Footnotes! A simple mobile application that allows users to record and capture their pre-start safety checks and observations out in the field for reporting later.
Forms currently available on the app are:
• Take 5 • Job Safety Observations (JSO) • Hazard Identification
Forms in Safety Footnotes can be completed Offline and then sync later when connected to the network. "
" This is an initiative from the OTML 90 Day Challenge for 2019 and is in line with the OHS Standard (5-01) under Risk Management at Ok Tedi Mining Limited."
"The objective is to ensure risks to OTML employees, contractors and visitors are identified, assessed and controlled"
